Great art but... did we really need this after story? I mean Vol 4 already told us how it was gonna end up for her and here we get to see her just continuing her usual adventures... Oh well, no biggie, more fapping material options.

Believe or not porn sometimes can be more than just porn, it display the subconscious fear or desire. NTR start from the fear of getting betrayed, losing someone they deeply intimated. It is an almost unbearable pain. Stop and remember how you feel the first time you getting betrayed by your lover, or just read NTR for the first time. Human have 3 ways to control their emotions, modify or eliminate the stimulus or modify the respond. Some people choose to eliminate the stimulus by killing their lover, or cutting off them from their life and trying to forgot the experience,some trying to rewired their brain to take pleasure from it. Love and hate; pain and pleasure is separated by a very thin line.
